problem.markdown:
>>The towers of a cable-stayed bridge must resist what types of forces?<< ( ) Tension only ( ) Compression only ( ) Tension and bending (x) Compression and bending
[explanation] The cables of a cable-stayed bridge are connected directly to the tower thus cause bending in addition to compression. [explanation]
